com.codemelon.graph.vertex

Interface WeightedVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Vertex
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PrimVertex<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UndirectedPrimVertex

    public interface WeightedVertex
extends Vertex
    Vertex that maintains a floating point weight.

      Default vertex weight.
